headline: Record Backlog And Guidance Raise Might Change The Case For Investing In Quanta Services (PWR)
summary: Quanta Services recently reported a very strong quarter, delivering double-digit growth in revenue, adjusted EBITDA, and adjusted EPS, alongside a record US$39.20 billion backlog driven largely by accelerating demand in its Electric segment. The company’s sizeable backlog and highest full-year guidance raise among peers highlight how its execution capabilities are aligning with rising infrastructure investment needs. We’ll now explore how this record US$39.20 billion backlog and strong...
